sense.def: Alternative Names tong luan 痛攣 , pain with contraction; ju tong 拘痛 , cramps with pain. Illness Sign of pain affecting the extremities accompanied by a spasm making it difficult to stretch them. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 48: 夫風邪中於肢節，經於筋脈，若風挾寒氣者， 即拘急攣痛 , “Now, when wind evil strikes the joints of the limbs and passes through the sinews and vessels, if the wind is accompanied by cold, it results in cramps with tension, and contraction with pain ”.
